name: tranquility blanket
notes:
the tranquility blanket is a free crochet along.

** the free crochet along starts on oct. 14th 2024.**

> **[the full blanket pdf pattern is already available for purchase
> here][1]**

----------------------------------------

the pattern offers 2 blanket sizes - throw and lapghan, you can choose which size you want to make!

this crochet along is a collaboration of 10 different designers, each designed a different strip of the blanket.

the crochet along will take place for 6 weeks, each week 2 sections will be released (monday & thursday) and will be available to view for free on the designer's blog.

the links to all the different parts will be updated on **[the main cal post][2]**, where you can also find the full event details, materials needed and yarn quantities. 


  [1]: until [1 sc, ch 1, 1 mb] sts left before ch-3 sp. sk next sc, [1 sc, ch 1, 1 lb] in top of mb st, sk next 2 sts, wattle in ch-3 sp, turn.


  [1]: https://madebygootie.thrivecart.com/tranquility-blanket-ebook/?ref=ravelry
  [2]: https://madebygootie.com/crochet/tranquility-blanket-free-crochet-pattern/
